metadata.synopsis: This dialogue can happen in two phases: while pushing agianst rubble outside of the inn, or in a more generic setting (either searching the inn or clearing rubble).A Flaming Fist trying to force their way inside of a burning inn. They can hear someone inside - they believe it might be a Duke of Baldur's Gate, who they were sent to guard on her way to Elturel. Instead, they found the inn burning, its staff and guests murdered by goblins and drow in the night.

0.speaker: Fist Recruit Ito
0.text: We have to get them out!
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Standing, facing the playerInternalNodeContext: Desire is trapped behind rubble.
